Here are some things you can ask Spoon to do:
`!play something [tag]` <- try 'Fun'. This adds something fun to to Spoon's set list. To play immediately, use `!play something [tag] now`
`!play [song shortcut]` <- try 'despacito'  This adds despacito to Spoon's set list. To play immediately, use `!play [song shortcut] now`
`!play [youtube url]` <- try <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vd53Ay21YcE> This adds the youtube song to to Spoon's set list. To play immediately, use `!play [youtube url] now`
`!skip` <- skips the current song in the queue
`!songs` <- gets the list of songs in Spoon's repetoire
`!setlist` <- gets the current list of songs in Spoon's setlist.
`!tags` <- gets the list of available tags in Spoon's repetoire.
